title: Longganisa
summary: Longganisa is a staple Filipino breakfast often served as part of the "Long-si-log" trio, with fried rice (sinangag) and fried egg (itlog). This savory-sweet sausage is made by stuffing hog-casing with ground pork, deliciously flavored with spices and seasonings.

title: Tortang Tahong
summary: Tortang Tahong made of mussels, tomatoes, and fluffy eggs is a simple dish that's hearty and tasty. This seafood omelet is delicious served with steamed rice and your favorite dipping sauce.

title: Skinless Longganisa
summary: Skinless Longganisa with a delicious medley of sweet, savory, and garlicky flavors you'll love! Serve these Filipino pork sausages with garlic fried rice and sunny side eggs for a hearty and tasty breakfast.

title: Corned Beef Pandesal
summary: Corned Beef Pandesal is the heartier cousin of our classic Pandesal. This Filipino-style bread roll is the perfect anytime snack: soft, fluffy, and bursting with meaty corned beef!

title: Mango Bread Loaf
summary: Mango bread loaf is the best use for this season's mangoes! Soft and moist, and bursting with bright mango and warm cinnamon flavors, it makes a delicious breakfast or midday snack.

title: Tikoy
summary: Bring good luck to the New Year with Homemade Tikoy! This sticky rice cake is easy to make and so soft and chewy!

title: Champorado
summary: Champorado is the ultimate breakfast treat! This Filipino rice porridge is easy to make with only five ingredients and is delicious and comforting with an intense chocolate flavor. A guaranteed hit with kids and adults alike!

title: Filipino Scrambled Eggs
summary: Filipino Scrambled Eggs is a classic breakfast dish with tomatoes and onions. It's quick and easy to make yet so hearty and tasty. Perfect for breakfast, brunch, or any meal of the day!

title: Corned Beef Hash Breakfast Pizza
summary: Power up your day with the tastiest mashup ever. Corned Beef Hash Breakfast Pizza, topped with flavorful corned beef, runny eggs, and colorful bell peppers, is delicious, filling, and sure to be a crowd-pleaser. Perfect for weekend breakfast or brunch!

title: Bacon Fried Rice
summary: Bacon Fried Rice is easy to make with simple ingredients and in minutes. It's a hearty and tasty one-pot dish that's perfect for breakfast or anytime you need a quick meal.

title: Lugaw at Tokwa
summary: Lugaw at Tokwa is the perfect rainy-day comfort food! Not only is it filling and delicious, but it's also easy to make and budget-friendly. This rice congee and crispy tofu combination is sure to hit the spot!

title: Puto Maya and Sikwate
summary: Jump-start your day with Puto Maya and Sikwate! This Cebuana combination of sticky rice cake with juicy mangoes and hot chocolate is a delicious and filling treat for breakfast or any time of the day.

title: Ginisang Corned Beef
summary: Ginisang Corned Beef is easy to make in minutes and cooks in one pan. It's a hearty and tasty combination of chunky corned beef, and diced potatoes you'll love for breakfast, brunch, or any meal of the day.

title: Corned Beef Frittata
summary: Level up breakfast with a hearty and tasty corned beef frittata. It's loaded with potatoes, green peas, and eggs for a delicious and energy-packed dish for breakfast, lunch, or dinner!

title: Taho
summary: Taho is a Filipino delicacy made of silken tofu, sago pearls, and brown sugar syrup. It's a delicious vegan soy dessert traditionally enjoyed for breakfast or any time you need a quick boost of energy.

title: Arroz a la Cubana
summary: Arroz a la Cubana is a flavorful ground beef hash traditionally served with rice, saba bananas, and fried eggs. It's easy to make, budget-friendly, and a hearty meal that's sure to be a dinner favorite.

title: Tinapa Fried Rice
summary: Tinapa Fried Rice is a delicious take on everyday fried rice! Smoked fish flakes, fluffy eggs, and green onions make it a flavorful side dish perfect for breakfast!

title: Beef Tapa
summary: Beef Tapa marinated in fish sauce, brown sugar, and fresh garlic. This Kapampangan delicacy is easy to prepare, freezable, and makes a great all-day breakfast meal!

title: Calamansi Muffins
summary: Bakery-style Calamansi Muffins with a tangy citrus glaze are super moist, tender, and bursting with calamansi flavor! They're perfect for breakfast and brunch or as an on-the-go snack.

title: Eggplant and Tomato Torta
summary: Eggplant and tomato torta filled with fresh veggies and is delicious for any meal of the day!

title: Sinangag
summary: Sinangag is the perfect use for day-old rice. Loaded with fragrant garlic bits, this Filipino-style fried rice makes a delicious and filling side dish for breakfast or any time of the day meal.

title: Chicken Tapa
summary: Chicken tapa marinated in soy sauce, lemon juice, and fresh garlic. Serve with garlic fried rice and sunny side up eggs for a delicious morning treat!

title: Poqui Poqui
summary: Poqui Poqui made of roasted eggplant, tomatoes, and eggs. Healthy, filling, and delicious, it's a meatless breakfast or dinner meal the whole family will love.

title: Filipino Tamales
summary: Filipino Tamales are a traditional Kampangan delicacy you'll love for breakfast or snack. Made of rice flour, coconut milk, and peanut butter, topped with chicken and eggs and steamed to perfection, they're hearty and tasty!

title: Filipino Beef Tapa
summary: Filipino Beef Tapa is easy to make and tastes so much better than store-bought. Serve with garlic fried rice and sunny side eggs for a classic Tapsilog breakfast!

title: Daing na Bangus
summary: Daing na Bangus is one of the best-tasting fish, in my opinion, but it can be a bit cumbersome because of all the bones. Watch the video to learn how to debone and make eating easier. Plus, try the simple marinade that makes the milkfish super tasty!

title: Chicken Tocino
summary: Chicken Tocino is marinated in pineapple juice, ketchup, and spices for sweet and garlicky flavors you'll love! This Filipino cured meat is easy to make and delicious as an all-day breakfast meal.

title: Homemade Pork Tocino
summary: Pork Tocino is a hearty Filipino all-day breakfast served with sunny-side-up eggs and garlic fried rice. Sweet and garlicky, it's sure to be a family favorite.
